description.en: Given an 'out' string of length 4, and a word, return a new string where the word is in the middle of the out string.
description.ru: Дана строка out длины 4 и слово word. Верните строку, где word помещено внутрь out.
description.uz: 4 belgili out va word berilgan. word out ichiga qo‘yilgan yangi satr qaytaring.
